title: Palimaru Matha
desc: Rathotsavas are conducted every year which attracts tourists from all over Karnataka.
tips: Carry an umbrella when visiting during mid-day or so
best_time_to_visit: Early morning or late afternoon for pleasant weather and calm waters.

how_to_visit.by_bike: Come along the highway from Udupi
how_to_visit.by_public: You will have to walk a bit if you take a public transport for this
